alert.note: Alert for Claiborne; Webster (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 13 at 8:13PM CDT until June 13 at 9:00PM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: The National Weather Service in Shreveport has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... North central Webster Parish in northwestern Louisiana... Central Claiborne Parish in northwestern Louisiana... * Until 900 PM CDT. * At 812 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located just southwest of Shongaloo, or 11 miles southeast of Springhill, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Homer, Shongaloo, Lisbon, Leton, Lake Clairborne, Antioch and Summerfield. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: This storm is producing large hail. SEEK SHELTER NOW inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows!
